name: The Council of Fluff and Stuff
name_original: The Council of Fluff and Stuff
description:
A short game about a child struggling with the grief of her parents getting divorced. In order to cope with this, she hosts a council meeting with her stuffed animals and cat, each symbolizing a stage of grief.

This is a small bitsy project I took on for one of my game design classes. It's more of a demo than anything else since I'm still getting used to the software, but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless!

Music is not mine! It's Rose's Room (SLOWED DOWN) - Steven Universe OST:
